decision_conditions: The modification sought to remove clause 3(b) of section 106 legal agreement for planning permission reference P0859.12 dated 13/11/2012 would remove the granny annex status of the building for use by dependent relatives of the occupants of the main dwelling (No. 3 Heath Close, Romford) as part of the same planning unit, sharing facilities including access, parking and amenity space and as such, would result in a separate detached dwelling unit which would be out character with the area and would have a substandard living accommodation for existing and future occupiers contrary policies 7 and 26 of Havering Local Plan 2021 and the National Planning Policy Framework which seeks to ensure a high standard of amenity for existing and future occupants of land and buildings. There is no other evidence to justify why clause 3 (b) should be removed over the passage of time.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent via email on 17th April 2023.
description: Application to modify planning obligation section 106 agreement to remove clause 3 (b) (the requirement that the annexe shall only be occupied by relatives of the main property) of planning permission reference P0859.12 dated 13/11/12
